hadiths.text: Narrated Salim al-Makki: That a bedouin told him that he brought a milch she-camel in the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). He alighted with Talhah ibn Ubaydullah (and wanted to sell his milch animal to him). He said: The Prophet (ﷺ) forbade a townsman to sell for a man from the desert. But go to the market and see who buys from you. consult me thereafter, and then I shall ask you (to sell) or forbid you

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي النَّهْىِ أَنْ يَبِيعَ حَاضِرٌ لِبَادٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Prohibition Of A Town-Dweller Selling On Behalf Of A Bedouin
